mapper.select: select t.*, u1.nickname as sellerName, u2.nickname as buyerName, u1.loc1 as sLoc1, u1.loc2 as sLoc2, u1.loc3 as sLoc3, u2.loc1 as bLoc1, u2.loc2 as bLoc2, u2.loc3 as bLoc3, p.title as title from trade t, user_info u1, user_info u2, item_post p where t.seller = u1.id and t.buyer = u2.id and ((t.seller = #{userId} and t.buyer_content is not null) or (t.buyer = #{userId} and t.seller_content is not null)) and p.id = t.item_post_id
